author: kwall
msg: NO-JIRA: Queues now support a description attribute which can be specified at queue declaration time (x-qpid-description argument) either via AMQP (QueueDeclare) or JMX (ManagedBroker#createNewQueue). After queue declaration time, queue description is maintainable via JMX ManagedQueue#setDescription. It can be queried via AMQ QueueQuery.
Workarounds for the historic mis-use of owner as a description:
ManagedBroker#createNewQueue has been changed to map the owner actual parameter into the description
argument.  BDB V5 to V6 store upgrade will move the contents of the owner field to the description
argument for all non-exclusive queues. These workarounds can be disabled by system property.
Updated JMX minor version by one.

author: jacopoc
msg: Implemented screen that shows details about JobSandbox records, including their input data (RuntimeData.runtimeInfo deserialized) if available.
